alert.note: Alert for St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Martin and southeastern St. Landry Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Henderson, or near Breaux Bridge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breaux Bridge, Henderson, Atchafalaya Welcome Center, Butte La Rose, Cecilia and Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 112 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
